snp5.2:1040: “Who here is contented in the world?”“For whom is there no agitation?Who, having directly known both ends,by reflection does not get stuck in the middle?Whom do you call a great man?Who here has transcended the seamstress?” (1)
snp5.2:1041: One leading the spiritual life among sensual pleasures,“one without craving, always mindful,a bhikkhu who is quenched, having comprehended:for him there is no agitation. (2)
snp5.2:1042: “Having directly known both ends,by reflection one does not get stuck in the middle.I call him a great man:he has here transcended the seamstress.” (3)
